function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of predictability in the distribution of digital initiatives for health and education support","Impact":"Ineffective response to pandemic situations and emergency needs","Mitigation":"Developing a more comprehensive understanding of each city's capacity for adaptation and the tendencies of the locals","Technologies":"Data analytics and predictive modeling for identifying patterns and trends","People":"Citizens relying on digital initiatives for health and education support","Owner":"Government authorities and city planners"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in impact assessment and cause-and-effect relationship","Impact":"Difficulty in measuring and validating the effectiveness of digital strategies in the future","Mitigation":"Developing robust impact assessment methodologies and measurement tools","Technologies":"Predictive modeling, data analytics, and impact assessment tools","People":"Researchers, policymakers, and city officials","Owner":"Research institutions and government bodies"},{"Description":"Dual challenge of anticipating demands and responding to emergencies","Impact":"Ineffective allocation of resources and strategies in addressing pandemic situations","Mitigation":"Developing flexible and adaptive digital strategies that can address both anticipated and emergency needs","Technologies":"Agile development methodologies and adaptive technology platforms","People":"City planners, emergency response teams, and healthcare professionals","Owner":"City authorities and technology developers"}]}
